attributes.action: Demand A Raise In Weekly Payments From The EMA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Students ages 16-18 are being payed a maximum of £30 a week from the EMA to stay on at school till 5th/6th year,being a student myself I find it extremely hard to live on this whilst contunuing with my education because it just isnt enough to cover all expensises [and no,Im not the type of girl to spend it all in one day on nothing,i use it for its intended purposes].I propose that the EMA raises this payment at LEAST £10 more for EVERY student,rich or poor.
